Cepo 0.0.1

  • Changelog

Extract differential statistics p-values from DX methods

getPvalues.Rd

Extract differential statistics p-values from DX methods

getPvalues(object, returnDF = TRUE)

Arguments

object

a computed result from Cepo()
returnDF

Whether return a data.frame, default to TRUE.

Value

If returnDF is set to TRUE, then returns a data frame. Otherwise returns a list.

Examples

set.seed(1234)
n = 50 ## genes, rows
p = 100 ## cells, cols
exprsMat = matrix(rpois(n*p, lambda = 5), nrow = n)
rownames(exprsMat) = paste0("gene", 1:n)
colnames(exprsMat) = paste0("cell", 1:p)
cellTypes = sample(letters[1:3], size = p, replace = TRUE)

cepo_output = Cepo(exprsMat = exprsMat, cellTypes = cellTypes)
limma_output = doLimma(exprsMat = exprsMat, cellTypes = cellTypes)
voom_output = doVoom(exprsMat = exprsMat, cellTypes = cellTypes)
ttest_output = doTtest(exprsMat = exprsMat, cellTypes = cellTypes)
wilcoxon_output = doWilcoxon(exprsMat = exprsMat, cellTypes = cellTypes)

getPvalues(cepo_output)

#> DataFrame with 0 rows and 0 columns
getPvalues(limma_output)

#> DataFrame with 50 rows and 3 columns
#>                a         b         c
#>        <numeric> <numeric> <numeric>
#> gene1  0.8077477 0.4941586 0.3087514
#> gene10 0.7483290 0.1603093 0.2512122
#> gene11 0.9891773 0.6057611 0.5884528
#> gene12 0.2483644 0.0426873 0.3901915
#> gene13 0.0353792 0.8913883 0.0245593
#> ...          ...       ...       ...
#> gene50  0.669312  0.414420  0.698616
#> gene6   0.335233  0.284066  0.960045
#> gene7   0.618174  0.476530  0.182572
#> gene8   0.654314  0.372971  0.652253
#> gene9   0.664278  0.359575  0.626502
getPvalues(voom_output)

#> DataFrame with 50 rows and 3 columns
#>                a         b         c
#>        <numeric> <numeric> <numeric>
#> gene1  0.5795634  0.551816 0.1781701

#> gene11 0.8623981  0.934108 0.9790521
#> gene12 0.0994252  0.052269 0.6554661
#> gene13 0.1459113  0.893106 0.0839446
#> ...          ...       ...       ...

#> gene6   0.580372  0.427003  0.851536

#> gene8   0.803435  0.791606  0.988265
#> gene9   0.835461  0.406520  0.581490
getPvalues(ttest_output)
